title: 1943: The Battle of Midway
description: Continuing to use the context of World War II, the manufacturer Capcom released 1943: The Battle of Midway (NES) in 1987 with many new combat missions. The setting of the game will take place during the fierce phase of the Pacific Front during World War 2 between the US Navy and the Imperial Japanese Navy. The main battle area is taking place at Midway Atoll. Your mission in this version is to search for combined fleets of the Imperial Japanese Navy and destroy them. Along the way, you will face many fighters or destroyers, cruisers of fascist Japan. There are 16 missions in the game for you to complete; each task will set a specific goal for you to destroy (strategic bombers or battleships). In particular, the first 11 missions will bring air battles, and bosses are different battleships. And the last five levels, you will have to fight the protection aircraft and bomber squadrons to complete the game.

title: Adventure Island
description: Adventure Island is a special action-adventure game released by Nintendo in 1988. The game revolves around the events of Master Higgins on a journey across the southern Pacific Ocean. With the mission of rescuing Princess Tina from the Evil Witch Doctor, he must go through many dangers and difficulties along the way. The mission succeeds when Master Higgins defeats the evil Evil Witch Doctor and frees Tina.

title: Adventure Island 3
description: With great success from the previous version of Adventure Island series games, Hudson Soft games continue issuing Adventure Island 3 with many changes. The game retains action gameplay combined with realistic images promising to bring interesting experiences to players.

title: Adventure Island II
description: With new journeys, Adventure Island II will take you to an adventure and rescue the abducted girlfriend of Master Higgins. The main protagonist’s girlfriend is Tina, she was captured by the Evil Witch Doctor’s minions. Knowing this information, Master Higgins needs to travel through eight different islands to rescue his girlfriend. Each island will bring different enemies and traps to overcome. Besides, each island will be controlled by a tycoon. To defeat the boss and overcome the mysterious islands above, you will receive the help of 4 loyal dinosaurs (they will help those who dare to defeat those who oppress them).
releaseDate:
NA: February, 1991
JP: April 26, 1991
EU: July 22, 1992

title: Adventures of Lolo
description: Prince Lolo of Gentryland visited Eden, a country of Love and Peace, and enjoyed many pleasant days with Princess Lala of Eden. But one day, Egger, the King of Darkness, who had an evil plot to conquer Eden, spirited the Princess away before Lolo’s eyes. After a long and difficult journey, Lolo has come to the evil Castle of the Labyrinth. The castle is guarded by an army of evil monsters led by Egger, the King of Darkness. Can Lolo solve the seemingly endless series of mazes and save Lala? Lolo is not gifted with strength or agility, but has great courage and patience. Now the battle of wits begins. Good luck, Lolo!

title: Akumajou Special: Boku Dracula-kun
description: Kid Dracula is an unusual side-scroller from Konami. It’s a parody of the company’s popular Castlevania series. Instead of playing as a member of the Belmont family, you play as young Kid Dracula. You have been woken up from your sleep by the evil demon Garamos, who’s been wrecking havoc in Dracula’s Castle. It’s up to you to stop him by traveling across several different locations, including Dracula’s Castle, New York, the Sea, and Egypt! Gameplay consists of very standard jump and shoot platform action. As you progress through the 8 levels, you gain the ability to perform spells, such as turning into a bat, and different special attacks, such as a spread / homing attack. You can also spend the coins you get when you defeat enemies in one of several mini-games that show up when you’re between levels.

title: Aladdin
description: Reprenant les différentes séquences du film d’animation de Disney, Aladdin sur NES permet de retrouver tous les personnages de l’histoire. Ce jeu de plates-formes propose effectivement de suivre Aladdin des rues d’Agrabah aux couloirs du palais royal en passant bien sûr par la célèbre caverne aux merveilles. Le Génie est aussi de la partie et permet de gagner des bonus.

title: Arkanoid
description: Arkanoid is an interesting puzzle game that will test the player’s perseverance through various stages. Coming to this game, you will have to skillfully control Vaus to keep the ball from falling to the ground and destroy all the bricks on the playground. Besides, this game also prepares many items with unique features to support players in different challenges.

title: Armed for Battle
description: Armed for Battle is a unique, real time strategy (RTS) game. The game allows you to build up your own kingdom, seek out enemies in the surrounding land, and send out battle parties to invade, all while fending off incoming attacks.

title: Back to the Future
description: Inspired by a movie of the same name, Back to the Future is an adventure-type game released in 1989. The plot revolves around the character Marty McFly, a schoolboy who accidentally returned to the past when his car powered by nuclear fuel. Waking up in 1955, Marty McFly met Lorraine Baines and George McFly, who were the parents of the young boy. The sudden appearance of Marty McFly has made the boy’s future can be changed. Marty McFly’s mother liked the boy and Marty McFly’s father was constantly bullied and beaten by friends. Marty McFly must try to do everything to protect his father from Biff and his bullying team as well as reject his mother’s affection and help the two lovers. If not, it would all be meaningless when the family photo he brought would disappear and he would not be able to return to the present. The story ends when Marty McFly succeeds and returns to reality.

title: Balloon Fight
description: The challenges of Balloon Fight are relatively simple, participating in this game, you will enjoy the fun balloons battle. Characters will be equipped with 2 balloons and use them to fly into the air. Enemies are also equipped with balloons like you. Therefore, you have the duty to destroy the opponent’s balloons and ensure the safety of 2 balloons of the character. When a balloon of a character explodes, the movement range of the character will be limited. In particular, 2 balloons are destroyed together, the character will be deducted 1 life (the game will provide 3 lives when starting the challenge). Each enemy is successfully destroyed and dropped into the water, a balloon will fly up. Once there, you just need to destroy the balloons to get more bonus points.
releaseDate:
JP: January 22, 1985
NA: June 1986
PAL: March 12, 1987

title: Baseball
description: Baseball is a simple baseball video game made by Nintendo in 1983 for the Nintendo Family Computer, making it one of the first games released for the Famicom. It was later one of the NES’s 18 launch titles when it was released in 1985 in the United States. As in real baseball, the object of the game is to score the most runs. Up to two players are supported. Each player can select from one of six teams. Although there is no difference between them other than uniform color, they are meant to represent the six members of the Japanese Central League.

title: Batman
description: As a game with the main character as a superhero, Batman is a famous game developed by Sunsoft. The game is built on an existing storyline. The game is set in the people of Gotham City are actively planning for the 200th-anniversary festival. After falling into a chemical vat, Jack Napier became the evil Joker. He persecuted people in the city by spreading DDID Nerve Gas poison gas around the town. In that critical situation, Batman is the only one capable of freeing the city from the Joker threat. When Batman was young, his parents were killed by Joker. With profound hatred for the crimes committed by the Joker, Batman wants to use all his power to rescue the city and avenge his parents. With special weapons and mobility, he will have to defeat all enemies and destroy the various devices that Joker has set before coming to the final battle with the Joker in Gotham church.
releaseDate:
JP: December 22, 1989
NA: February 13, 1990
EU: September 14, 1990

title: Batman: Return of the Joker
description: Based on a famous comic book related to Batman superhero, Sunsoft’s manufacturer released a fascinating adventure game, Batman: Return of the Joker. Some rare metals have recently disappeared unexplained in the mineral mines of Gotham City. In particular, one of the missing metals is often used to make bombs or rocket missiles to serve World War. After discovering that precious and dangerous mineral source disappeared. Gotham City police forces tried to investigate the case, but all of the clues were unclear. From there, they decided to seek the help of the famous hero and representative of the city – Batman. Upon accepting the case, Batman suspected a former enemy of himself as the cause of these secret events – Joker.
releaseDate:
JP: December 20, 1991
NA: December 20, 1991
EU: November 19, 1992

title: Batman: The Video Game
description: He’s totally new. Totally tough. And he’ll stop at nothing to make sure justice prevails! From the dark streets of GOTHAM CITY to the deepest corners of the criminal underworld comes the CAPED CRUSADER as you’ve never seen him before. Incredibly strong. Armed to the teeth. And ready to put his life on the line for the sake of all, on a search-and-destroy mission to end the Joker’s reign of terror. He leaps, he flies, he dodges enemy fire and delivers it right back… with a vengeance. This is no kid stuff. This is as real as video gaming gets. If you liked what you saw in the movie, you’re gonna love what you see here. Because this time around, BATMAN is all business, and he won’t let anything stand in his way!

title: Battle City
description: Battle City is a refined and updated version of Namco’s arcade game Tank Battalion. Destroy different enemy tanks, while trying to keep them away from your base. When you have destroyed 20 enemy tanks you advance to the next level with different layout. In each level there’s some obstacles which you can use to your advantage. Obstacles include red bricks which you can shoot out of your way, silver bricks which are highly armored, water and ice. You start the game with a basic tank, which you can power up to better one little by little. The game includes a construction mode, so you can make your own levels when you have played through all the 35 original levels.

title: Battle Kid: Fortress of Peril
description: Inspired from the indie game “I Wanna be the Guy” and other classic platformers, the game follows the style dubbed Metroidvania in that you do not have stages, but rather one large area to freely explore. You always die in one hit, but there are unlimited continues in the normal difficulty as well as a password system to resume where you last left off. In total, there are over 550 rooms, 8 bosses, and over 30 different types of enemies. You will also obtain items along the way that grant you new abilities such as higher jumping or slower falling in order to travel to new areas of the fortress. Can you survive the perils that lie ahead?

title: Battletoads
description: Battletoads is an animated film with unique content produced by DIC Animation City to compete with Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. The film revolves around three main characters, Rash, Zitz, and Pimple. After the film’s success, a game version was developed based on the film’s plot and first released in June 1991.

title: Bionic Commando
description: Bionic Commando was developed with the context after World War II. The world is controlled by two powerful forces, the Republic and the Empire. However, the Empire had a fascist ideology and was also known under a different name, the Royal Country. After discovering a secret document of the Third Reich in 1980. Generalissimo Killt, the leader of the Empire, decided to implement the crazy plan contained in the document. This document is called the Albatross Plan, and it records how to revive the leadership of the Third Reich – Mr. Badd — facing the risk of the fascist regime invading the world again. The Republicans waged war on the Empire. They then sent a spy into the Empire’s territory to prevent Generalissimo Killt’s plan to revive fascism. This particular agent has the alias Super Joe.
releaseDate:
JP: July 20, 1988
NA: December 1988
EU: October 26, 1990

title: Blades of Steel
description: Coming to Blades of Steel, you have the opportunity to explore Ice hockey – an interesting sport for everyone to relax in the winter. This game offers 2 familiar game modes that are multiplayer or 1 player. Before starting to explore, you can choose 1 of the 2 game modes above. In particular, challenge 1 player is designed with 2 other game modes are Exhibition and Tournament. With the Exhibition, you will enjoy simple matches with AI or connect with other players to enjoy the 1 vs 1 challenge. For Tournament, you are allowed to compete in the National Hockey League.

title: Bomberman
description: Bomberman is an action game released by Nintendo in 1987. The game was developed with the gameplay of bombs destroying familiar enemies. Players will control their character in an available map. Their mission is to use bombs to overcome obstacles and destroy enemies.

title: Bomberman II
description: Following the success of its predecessor, Bomberman II is a game released on Nintendo in 1991 by Hudson Soft. In Europe, the game is titled Dynablaster. The story depicts the White Bomberman, a Bomberman who was unjustly charged with crimes committed by Black Bomberman. After being imprisoned, White Bomberman tried to find a way out to prove his purity. At the same time, find and bring Black Bomberman to justice. The game ends when White Bomberman is vindicated and Black Bomberman is thrown into jail.

title: Bubble Bobble
description: Coming to Bubble Bobble, you will discover fun and gentle challenges, this game allows 2 players to participate. The two main characters of the game are Bobby and Bubby. The girlfriend of the two main characters has been kidnapped by Baron Von Blubba. Besides, he also uses magic to turn Bobby and Bubby into Bubble Dragons. To rescue his girlfriend and defeat the evil baron, you need to go through dozens of different stages in the Cave of Monsters. At each stage, you will have to destroy the monsters on the map to complete the level. Each level will bring a different number of monsters to defeat and the number of enemies will increase gradually in stages. Therefore, players need perseverance and intelligent control to defeat many enemies at once.

title: Bucky O’Hare
description: In Bucky O’Hare, you will accompany Captain Bucky to rescue the members of his crew. We are being held captive in 4 different planets. First, Bucky’s spacecraft is traveling in space when the army of Toad Air Marshall attacks and kidnaps the crew members. Four members were kidnapped: Blinky, Willy, Jenny, and Deadeye. In addition, each crew member is detained in different areas. Therefore, Bucky must overcome many pitfalls and enemies in different areas to rescue his friends. The game will bring 4 planets for you to fight and rescue friends imprisoned there: Green Planet, Red Planet, Blue Planet, and Yellow Planet. In addition, each planet is prepared with its own environment (ice, jungle, machines, and fire). In particular, this game does not require you to rescue the characters in a fixed order. Instead, you can choose 1 of 4 planets to start the rescue mission.
releaseDate:
NA: January 1992
JP: January 31, 1992
EU: February 18, 1993

title: Captain America and The Avengers
description: Captain America and The Avengers is a game based on the fact that the movie is actually a superhero team of Marvel. The game was released by Nintendo in 1991. The characters in the game also follow the appearance of superheroes in the Marvel movie universe. In this adventure, players will have to play one of the four members of the Avengers such as Captain America, Iron Man, Hawkeye, and Vision. To defeat the evil Red Skull, he gathered a powerful army of many minions who are notorious criminals like Klaw, Living Laser, Whirlwind, Sentinel, Wizard, Grim Reaper, Mandarin, The Juggernaut, Ultron, assassin Crossbones in a subject plot to annex the whole world. And this is also the first arcade game to be sold in two forms. The first is a version that allows four players at the same time, with each player controlling a specific character. The second is an alternate version with two-player gameplay, with players being able to choose from any of the four available characters.

title: Captain Tsubasa Vol. II: Super Striker
description: Captain Tsubasa II: Super Striker is a Sports game, developed and published by Tecmo, which was released in Japan in 1990.

title: Castlevania
description: “Castlevania” is a game of the famous Japanese genre, and it was first released in 1986. With adventure stories and many levels to explore, you will be comfortable relaxing and challenge your perseverance. You have the task of controlling “Simon” and help him overcome many dangerous traps along the way. In addition to crazy traps, you also have to fight with many different types of enemies in each level.

title: Castlevania II: Simon’s Quest
description: Castlevania II: Simon’s Quest is an action-adventure game released by Konami. Continue the journey of Simon Belmontsau after coming to Castlevania and defeat Count Dracula. With this version, players will control vampire hunter Simon Belmont on the journey to eliminate the curse of Dracula. To find the clues, the player will control Simon talking to the villagers. In addition, Simon will fight enemies to move into inaccessible areas. He can also find merchants who supply items to collect more clues. While destroying the enemy, Simon will receive hearts. These hearts will help him pay the people who have provided the information. Simon’s only weapon in fights is the whip. To upgrade his weapons, he can buy additional whips at the store at certain locations in the game. Collecting more hearts will help Simon increase his level. Every time he leveled up, Simon’s health limit was raised.

title: Castlevania III: Dracula’s Curse
description: Following the success of previous releases, Castlevania III: Dracula’s Curse continues to be a Nintendo-released game in the Castlevania video game series. The game is set in 1476, 215 years before the events in Castlevania and Castlevania II: Simon’s Quest. In 1476, Count Dracula brought an army of monsters to Europe with the aim of destroying humanity. In response to this situation, the church requested help from the Vampire Killer Whip. For centuries, this clan was expelled from the land because people feared their powerful supernatural powers. Trevor Belmont – the current ruler of Vampire Killer Whip, has accepted the task of destroying Dracula in the situation that Europe is in danger of being destroyed. Trevor and his friends cross the Transylvanian countryside, defeating Dracula’s henchman and finally defeating Dracula. Once Dracula-dad of Alucard is defeated, he will fall into a strange sleep and cannot recall fighting his father. Grant Dynasty oversees the restoration of Wallachia city after the battle is over. Trevor Belmont and Sypha Belnades married when peace was restored in the region.
releaseDate:
JP: December 22, 1989
NA: September 1, 1990
EU: December 10, 1992

title: Castlevania III: Dracula’s Curse
description: Taking place 100 years before the events of Castlevania 1 and Castlevania 2, Dracula the Vampire has risen up to threaten the small village of Warakiya. Citizens who had banished the Belmont family now beg for Trevor Belmont’s help in slaying Dracula. In his strange castle, Dracula has been assembling a massive army of undead creatures to sweep the Earth clean of life and bring everlasting darkness. Trevor agrees to help and equips his family’s hereditary whip, the “Vampire Slayer”, in order to destroy Dracula.

title: Chip ‘n Dale Rescue Rangers
description:
Chip’ n Dale Rescue Rangers is a platform game developed by Capcom based on the famous Disney cartoon of the same name. Coming to this game, you will be accompanied by 2 lovely squirrels and are the main characters of the game (Chip and Dale). Besides the two main characters, you can also meet a number of other supporting characters (Gadget, Fat Cat, Zipper …)
Your first task in the game is to find a missing kitten. This cat belongs to Mandy, who asked Chip and Dale to search. During the mission, you will have to climb, jump over obstacles or pick up objects on the way (wooden crates, apples, balls, …) to throw at enemies. In it, wooden crates have the ability to cause normal damage and you can easily move while holding it in your hand. The apple can cause great damage but the movement speed is reduced when you are holding it in your hand. On your way, there will be traps and enemies to defeat. Besides picking up items to defeat enemies, you can also get help from allies after you collect special items. Zipper, he can appear and help you defeat all enemies that appear along the way. From there, you can freely move and just overcome the pitfalls. When encountering an impassable obstacle, Monterey Jack will appear and help you destroy that obstacle.
releaseDate:
JP: June 8, 1990
NA: June 1990
EU: December 12, 1991

title: Chip ‘n Dale Rescue Rangers 2
description: Chip’ n Dale Rescue Rangers 2 is an adventure game released by Capcom in 1993. The game was developed on A storyline is available. Fat Cat, a character who plots to destroy the city has escaped from prison. He has assigned the task of setting bombs at several locations to one of his rabbits and teammates. However, after successfully placing the bomb, the rabbit was captured by a rescue team. According to the investigation, the rescue team found Fat Cat as the leader of this case. In his plan, after the bomb is placed and detonated successfully, Fat Cat will flee to the harbor to collect Pharaoh’s Urn from a cargo ship. Police following the rabbit’s testimony immediately moved to the harbor to arrest Fat Cat. Realizing the danger, Fat Cat created a room with many pitfalls against the police. Successfully collecting Urn, the Fat Cat quickly activates it to free its hidden monsters. To prevent him from destroying the city again, the police quickly attacked the room where Fat Cat was hiding and attacked directly with the monster. Fat Cat returns to prison when the monster is destroyed.
releaseDate:
JP: December 10, 1993
NA: January 1994
EU: September 29, 1994

title: Chip ‘n Dale: Rescue Rangers
description: The rescue rangers are tiny heroes. Consisting of two chipmunks, two mice and a fly… these heroes may be small but there’s no case too big for them to take on. This game starts out simply enough, with a mission to rescue a small kitten, but soon escalates into a wider plot that pits the rescue rangers against their arch-nemesis, the feline kingpin, Fat Cat.

title: Circus Charlie
description: You are Charlie, a member of a circus troupe. Your job is to please the crowd by performing five death-defying stunts: Stunt #1: You and the lion must jump through several rings of fire. Remember to avoid the jugs that emit fire. You must do this for 100 meters. Stunt #2: Walk the tightrope for 70 meters, avoiding the monkeys that get in your way. Jump the cyan monkeys for 500 points. Stunt #3: Roll on a ball for 80 meters, jumping from ball to ball. You can move balls backwards if the target is too close to make a successful jump. Avoid contact with the ground. Stunt #4: Ride a horse for 200 meters, bouncing on trampolines along the way. Be careful not to miss the jump or go over the tops of trampolines. You can speed up or slow down the horse. Stunt #5: Finally, trapeze from swing to swing for 50 meters. If you miss, make sure that you land on the platforms below so you bounce back on a swing. Once you have completed all five stunts, you have to do them again and hopefully, more points will be awarded.

title: Contra
description: Contra is a very famous role-playing game released by Konami. The game takes place in the year 2633 AD, where the island of Galuga was ruled by the Red Hawk Organization with the plot to wipe out humanity. In this dangerous situation, the Earth Marine Corp team tasked with destroying the enemy and exploring alien forces controlling Red Hawk for two soldiers, Bill Rizer and Lance Bean. With two excellent soldiers of the Contra unit of Earth Marine Corp, the game supports up to 2 players at once, one is Bill, and one is Lance. Two players need to combine with each other when moving and destroy the target to overcome the obstacles quickly. Players use control buttons to move, attack enemies, and destroy the Red Hawk base defense machines. Players can roll when jumping, swimming, and lying down to destroy the immediate targets. In addition to controlling the character’s direction of movement, you can also control the trajectory, including lying or moving underwater. In addition, players can shoot targets in any direction such as top, bottom, left, right, and diagonal lines. Laying down can help players avoid attacks from enemies.

title: Contra Force
description: Contra Force is an action role-playing game and hostage rescue. In 1992, a task force consisting of various military experts in different fields was established to protect Neo City from terrorism. The commander of the team, Burns, after receiving information from the Fox-organization that provided information to them, learned that the intelligence department was hacked and stolen data by a terrorist organization called DNME. Burns was hosted by Fox at a press conference in Harbor to learn more about the situation, to create a plan to protect Neo City from DNME criminals.

title: Crystalis
description: With a post-apocalyptic background and opening a new era for human history, Crystalis will take an adventure and fight against the evil of a Young mage. In 1997, a new world war broke out and the participating nations activated the nuclear weapons systems they owned. Since then, the modern civilization of mankind has been destroyed. The survivors of the war returned to live in the Middle Ages after the use of machines or electronic devices stopped working. In addition, some residents after the Great War were contaminated with radiation and became mutants. Facing this harsh life, the survivors decided to research and build magic systems to help support and restore the human environment. In addition, they built a tower in the sky to prevent wars and disasters that threaten the survival of mankind. In particular, who can control this tower will control the world because it possesses a powerful weapon system. However, a person claiming to be Draygon built the Draygonia Empire with a mighty army. He combined magical powers with forbidden scientific studies to control humanity and seek to seize the tower in the sky.

title: Dai-2-Ji Super Robot Taisen
description: Dai-2-Ji Super Robot Taisen is a Strategy game, developed by WinkySoft and published by Banpresto, which was released in Japan in 1991.

title: Darkwing Duck
description: Darkwing Duck is an adventure game released by Capcom in 1992. The game revolves around the journey of a Darkwing hero against the sound plot to seize the city of FOWL. The player’s task is to control that hero to fight the bad guys in search of Steelbeak and rescue the city. They must overcome a series of difficulties in six different stages. At each stage, players must overcome a number of dangerous terrains such as sewers, towers, cities, bridges, and forests. Eventually, Darkwing will find his way to FOWL’s floating fortress and fight Stealbeak to complete his mission.

title: Dig Dug
description: Dig a little deeper into this thrilling action game as Dig Dug! Take up the role of Dig Dug, the champion of love and justice, as you drill through the ground and defeat any enemies that stray in your path. Clear the stage by avoiding and defeating the persistent Pooka and the deep-dwelling but whimsical Fygars. Hit enemies with the harpoon and pump air into them, or drop rocks from above. Pass through inflated enemies, or defeat multiple enemies in an adjacent passage for an even higher score. To earn a chance at bonus points, don’t forget to collect those vegetables that appear! Keep on digging, and outmatch the enemies that dwell deep underground!

title: Donkey Kong
description: Kana Kong (DK Hack) v1 DASTARDDonkey Kong is an action game released by Nintendo in 1981. Players will control Mario through a series of challenges while dodging and jumping over obstacles and probing information from enemies to rescue. A character named Pauline. He was imprisoned by a giant ape named Donkey Kong.

title: Donkey Kong Jr.
description: With the success of Donkey Kong, Nintendo continued to release Donkey Kong Jr action game in 1982 with many differences. After rescuing Pauline and capturing Donkey Kong, Donkey Kong Jr – his son began the journey to rescue his father from Mario’s confinement in a cave. In order to do that, Donkey Kong Jr has to go through many of the pitfalls and obstacles Mario has arranged. In the end, having overcome all difficulties along the way, he freed his father and Mario was chased.

title: Doraemon
description: Doraemon is an action game based on the popular children’s cartoon of the same name. As the eponymous blue robot cat, the player must rescue each of his friends who have been kidnapped. Much like Hudson’s earlier title Challenger, each stage plays differently from the others. In the first stage, Doraemon must explore a large top-view overworld. There are open manholes and “dokodemo Doors” that lead to various places and to side-scrolling areas. The goal is to find the proper path through the stage and to rescue Nobita. The second stage is a side-scrolling shooting stage, where Doraemon must make his way through three areas in order to rescue Suneo and Gian. The third and final stage is an underwater maze where Doraemon must collect various items and get help from his other friends in order to rescue Shizuka. There are numerous items to be found throughout the game that will increase Doraemon’s abilities, including increasing his maximum health (which can be refilled be collecting his favorite food Dorapan) and enhancing his offensive capabilities.

title: Double Dragon
description: In Double Dragon, you will be engaged in intense battles and have to fight with many enemies at the same time. The game will bring two game modes, single-player and multiplayer. Besides, it brings two characters to explore: Billy Lee and Jimmy Lee. When fighting in single-player mode, you are tasked to control Billy Lee and defeat many enemies that appear along the way. As for the multiplayer mode, the secondary player will control Jimmy Lee and join the fight with his friends.

title: Double Dragon 3: The Rosetta Stone
description: At the end of the revenge mission, the Lee brothers took part in a harsh training mission for 2 years. Returning from the training mission, the two main characters met a fortune-teller along the way – Hiruko. The woman said that they will find the strongest warrior in the world to defeat after collecting all 3 Rosetta stones hidden in different areas of the world. Since then, a new adventure has been opened by Jimmy and Billy Lee.
releaseDate:
JP: February 22, 1991
NA: February 1991
EU: 1991
AU: 1994

title: Double Dragon II: The Revenge
description: After the events of Double Dragon ended with the successful rescue of Marian. Double Dragon II: The Revenge will bring a new battle journey for players. After failing to defeat Jimmy Lee and Billy Lee. Instead of kidnapping Marian like before, the leader of the Black Warrior gang decided to shoot her to death. Consequently, Billy and Jimmy Lee decided to destroy the Black Warrior once more to avenge Marian.

title: Double Dragon III : The Sacred Stones
description: A year after the events of Double Dragon II: The Revenge, the Supreme Black Shadow Sensei and his Black Shadow Warriors lay defeated. Life has returned to normality for Billy Lee who is now running a dojo training students in the field of martial arts. However, one day when Billy is away, the dojo is attacked and Marion is kidnapped. A soothsayer named Hiruko has information on Marion’s disappearance: She claims the kidnappers will release Marion in exchange for the three sacred stones of power. Hiruko knows the locations of the stones, but they are located all over the earth.

title: Dr. Mario
description: Dr Mario is a fascinating puzzle game produced by Gunpei Yokoi and published by Nintendo. The game revolves around the character Mario, who takes on the role of a doctor, is tasked with eradicating viruses that harm human health. Players need to destroy the virus located in a box on the screen using the drop medicine. After removing all viruses, the player will be moved to the next level.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Super Butouden 2
description: Dragon Ball Z – Super Butoden 2 is a port of the SNES game of the same name, made by Hummer Team sometime during the 90’s.

title: Dragon Quest
description: From fairy tales, Dragon Quest (video game) will bring an exciting adventure for players and Overcome many crazy challenges to rescue the princess. This is a fascinating role-playing game for you to experience in your free time. At the beginning of the game, you will be taken to Tantegel castle of King Lorik. Here, you learn that Princess Gwaelin has been kidnapped by an evil lord – Dragonlord. Besides, you also have the task of finding Balls of Light after it was stolen from Tantegel castle.

title: Dragon Quest II
description: In Dragon Quest II’s new battle, players continue to participate in team-fighting challenges. You will control 3 different characters to defeat the bad guys who are plotting to rule the world with dark magic. The plot of this version involves the task of defeating the dark witch, Hargon. He is planning to summon Malroth monsters from hell to rule the world. Moonbrooke Castle was attacked by Hargon and a fortunate soldier escaped the attack. He quickly went to see King Midenhall to announce the event. Later, the king asked his son Prince Midenhall to perform a dangerous mission. To protect the kingdom, the prince will have to destroy Hargon alone.

title: Dragon Quest III
description: Dragon Warrior III is the concluding game of the first Dragon Quest/Dragon Warrior trilogy, and its story takes us back to the time period of the legendary Erdrick (also known as Loto), the ancestor of the first game’s hero. You are the son of a powerful warrior Ortega, skillful in physical combat and spellcasting. Your father went out to fight the evil Baramos, who is responsible for the appearance of monsters in your region, and never returned. You are sent by the king on a quest to continue your father’s brave deeds and to defeat Baramos.

title: Duck Hunt
description: Duck Hunt is a shooter released by Nintendo. Players will use the NES Zapper to shoot ducks that appear on CRT TV screens. They will have to destroy all 10 targets in each stage to move to the next stage. The ducks appear one or two at a time, and it needs three hits to take down.
releaseDate:
JP: April 29, 1984
NA: October 18, 1985
EU: August 15, 1987

title: DuckTales
description: Scrooge McDuck is a wealthy boss who loves rare treasures. Coming to DuckTales, you will be on the journey to find 5 special treasures of Scrooge McDuck. In addition, these 5 treasures will be hidden in 5 different lands. To be able to collect all 5 treasures, you must overcome many obstacles and defeat the bosses at the end of each land.
releaseDate:
NA: September 14, 1989
JP: January 26, 1990
EU: December 14, 1990

title: DuckTales 2
description: Scrooge McDuck is hot on the trail of the richest adventure ever. Pieces to the map of the Lost Treasure of McDuck have been scattered across the globe, and Scrooge must find them before the greedy Flintheart Glomgold grabs them. It's going to be a race to the finish as both of them try to find the treasure and become the richest duck in the world! Join Scrooge and his nephews as they explore the ancient pyramids of Egypt and do battle with swash-buckling pirates in the Bermuda Triangle. Help them search the haunted halls of an ancient Scottish castle and scale the watery heights of Niagara Falls. Aid Scrooge in his quest for the secret of the island of Mu and you'll gain the final clue to unravel the hidden location of the Lost Treasure of McDuck!

title: Elevator Action
description: Elevator Action is an action game released by Taito in 1983. The game revolves around the intrusion of a spy in a 30-story building. He will move in elevators to destroy the enemies that appear on the floors. Players will be involved in the exciting gun battle when controlling your character to attack the enemies that appear behind each door.

title: Excitebike
description: Excitebike will bring simple and interesting races to everyone. With 3 game modes, players will be allowed to set up many outstanding achievements of their own. Three modes are available in the game, including option A, option B, and design mode. By selecting A, you will carry out the challenges of the game individually. As for Option B, you have to compete with AI to win. In design mode, you are allowed to create and build your own unique tracks.
releaseDate:
JP: November 30, 1984
USA: October 18, 1985
CAN: February 3, 1986
EU: September 1, 1986

title: F-θ
description:
Run at a maximum speed of 255km/h!

This is a racing game with a rotating screen!
Take control of a racing car and race through a variety of 360-degree courses.

Drive through a variety of 360-degree courses within the time limit!
Animated demos add to the atmosphere!

Race queens will cheer you on before you start!
Each stage gets a little more extreme!

8 courses in total! Set your fastest lap ever!
Practice mode allows you to practice all the courses at any time!

You can practice at any time! Train hard and outperform your friends!

title: Family BASIC
description:
Family BASIC allowed users to program in a BASIC programming language (NS-HUBASIC) that was developed specifically for use on the Famicom. The cartridge came with a keyboard and required the use of the Famicom Data Recorder in order to save any created programs.

The cartridge was originally released as Family BASIC, but was later re-released as Family BASIC V3 with added memory. This version also came packaged with some games already included. Games are accessed by typing GAME followed by a space then a number (0, 1, 2, or 3).

The following are the games that were included:

GAME 0 is the Heart Game. Using either a microphone or the keyboard, players get to fill in a heart with Mario and Pauline (of Donkey Kong fame) meeting in the middle for a smooch.

GAME 1 is the Number Game. Players control a penguin on a grid collecting numbers in sequential order while trying to avoid the Sidesteppers from Mario Bros..

GAME 2 is the Mario Game. Players are able to control Mario in game levels that they themselves make.

GAME 3 is Star Killer. 1 or 2 players control their spaceship trying to shoot as many enemies as they can.

title: Faxanadu
description: Faxanadu is an immersive action game released by Hudson Soft in 1987. The main content of the game revolves around the journey to find a way back to the countryside. The scent of the main character. After a long period of wandering, he stops near Eolis, his town. This place has been badly destroyed and almost no life appears. Upon further investigation, he discovered the town being attacked by Dwarves and goblins under the direction of The Evil One. The Evil One emerges from a meteorite and turns Dwarves into monsters. He wants to take the magic sword from the Dwarves to plotting to take over the entire Eolis area. However, King Greet knew the plot and swallowed the sword inside. Players will control their character in search of the King of Dwarves and take the magic sword to destroy The Evil One.
releaseDate:
JP: November 16, 1987
NA: August, 1989
EU: December 28, 1990

title: Felix the Cat
description: Felix the Cat is an adventure game released by Hudson Soft in 1993. Felix’s girlfriend Kitty has an evil professor arrest. Facing that situation, Felix began the journey to find and destroy the professor and rescue his girlfriend.

title: Final Fantasy
description: With a team-fighting element, Final Fantasy (video game) will bring more intense battles to the player. To manage a combat group, you need good focus and have a smart battle plan. Square Enix manufacturer has prepared 4 attractive game modes for everyone to experience. Four basic game modes include Menu Screen, Battle Screen, Dungeon, Town and Overworld.

title: Final Fantasy II
description: After the success of Final Fantasy, Final Fantasy II was released by Square in 1988 with many differences. The Palamecian Empire wanted to rule the world by using its dark forces. The game supports up to four players to participate in the quest to destroy the Palamecian empire.

title: Final Fantasy III
description: Following the success of team combat missions and immersive challenges of the first two Final Fantasy versions. Final Fantasy III was released in Japan in 1990. In this version, the story of the game will revolve around the four main characters. They are orphans raised in Ur village on a floating continent and taken care of by the elder Topapa village. One day, they discovered a mysterious cave hidden inside the Altar cave, near the village of Ur. Deep inside the cave, four children spotted a crystal of light. They are given a piece of this crystal to help it perform the task of balancing the power between light and darkness for the world. After receiving the power and the mission, the four children bid farewell to the elder Topapa and began their journey to protect the world.

title: Fire Emblem Gaiden
description: Follow Alm and Celica on their adventures through the kingdoms of Rigel and Zofia in this side story to the original Fire Emblem! Fire Emblem Gaiden delivers the same strategic gameplay of the original while introducing new features and mechanics to keep players engaged.

title: Friday the 13th
description: Friday the 13th is a horror game released by LJN in 1989. The game is set in Crystal Lake, where the kids in school or play. Jason, an evil lord is angry and conspiracy to destroy mankind. To prevent him from carrying out this conspiracy, the player will play the role of Mark, a young man who begins the journey to search for Jason’s hiding place and destroy him.

title: Galaga
description: You will control a spaceship and move across the screen at the bottom. The game design stays true to the vertical shooting style but adds unique features. In addition, alien forces dive towards you to drop bombs, but you can counterattack. Many missiles can be used in the stages that continue endlessly. The bonus rounds appear after every two normal levels. Therefore, these special stages allow for freely shooting enemies to gain extra points. Some enemies possess tractor beams and can steal your vessel. However, the game gives you chances to recover it and upgrade your current one. The game tracks your progress and presents statistics when you lose.

title: Getsu Fuuma Den
description: In the first years of the Demon Age, a horrible demon named “Dragon Master” was revived by his minions in hell. To protect the peace of the overworld, the two eldest Fuuma brothers fought the Dragon Master. Both were unable to defeat him and were killed, losing their legendary Wave Swords, also called Hadoukens. To avenge their deaths, the last of the Fuuma brothers vowed to slay the Dragon Master, and take back the Hadoukens. Getsu Fuuma Den is an action game with slight RPG elements. You travel through the overworld on pre-determined paths, which branch most of the time, leading you to shops, places where you can encounter other characters, and dungeons. Once you descend into a dungeon, you navigate your character on a platform, jumping and fighting enemies with your sword or other weapons. There are also a few first-person dungeons later in the game. In the dungeons you can collect money and then use it to buy weapons and other accessories on the overworld.

title: Ghostbusters
description: Ghostbuster was inspired by the film of the same name. It was designed by David Crane and published by Brad Fregger for Nintendo in 1984. Physicist Abby Yates is working on a book about paranormal events at a university with an engineer. Jillian Holtzmann anomalies. Abby Yates asked Professor Erin Gilbert for help to find the information, but she refused because it was afraid it might affect her position. After Abby Yates published the book, Erin Gilbert persuaded her to delete the book. However, she will have to provide information about paranormal events at this school to Abby Yates.

title: Ghosts’n Goblins
description: Ghosts’ n Goblins is an action game released by Capcom with unique content. The game is the inspiration for many modern action games later. Prin-Prin is a princess of royal blood. Conspiracy to destroy humanity, Satan – a messenger from Hades was planning to kidnap the princess. After learning that the princess was abducted, Arthur, a knight who loved the princess, tried to rescue her from the enemy. However, to rescue the princess, he must go through the six gates protected by the soldiers of Satan to reach Hades – the place where the princess is held.

title: Golf
releaseDate:
JP: May 1, 1984
NA: October 18, 1985
EU: November 15, 1986

title: Gradius
description: Gradius (video game) is an interesting shooting game built with combat in space. Join the game, you have the opportunity to become a pilot and own a fighter plane for yourself. With movement in the horizontal screen, you have the task of destroying enemies that appear on the way. You will face a mighty military force of aliens. To destroy many enemies, you need to move continuously and collect energy blocks to upgrade weapons.

title: Gremlins 2: The New Batch
releaseDate:
NA: October 1990
JP: December 14, 1990
EU: February 21, 1991

title: Gun.Smoke
description: Gun.Smoke is a dramatic action game released by Capcom. The game is set in the far west of the United States, which is in a state of insecurity by the criminals. The task of the player is to control Billy, a bounty hunter with the mission to destroy all enemies and bring peace to the land.

title: Ice Climber
description: Ice Climber’s protagonists are Nana and Popo, they are responsible for taking back the vegetables that were stolen by a large condor before. The challenges of the game will take place in vertical screen motion, you will have to move from the bottom of the screen to go to the top of the screen and complete the task. The support tool of the 2 characters is Mallet. With this device, they can destroy the ice blocks on the way to open new paths. Besides, it also has the task of helping them defeat the enemies who intend to attack them.
releaseDate:
JP: January 30, 1985
NA: October 18, 1985
EU: September 1, 1986

title: Ice Hockey
description: Ice Hockey is a hockey sport game released by Nintendo in 1998. Game rules and penalties are similar to real life. The game field is also designed to resemble a hockey pitch in tournaments with a pitch covered with ice with a goal on either side. Each player is provided with ski boots, hockey sticks and helmets for safety during competition.

title: Jackal
description: Jackal is a thrilling action game released by Konami in 1986. After the great war, some of the soldiers of the Jackal unit were hatred of imprisonment. To rescue his teammates, the Jackal unit has specially trained four soldiers in extreme conditions to complete the mission. After a period of hard training, they have acquired the skills to fight and survive in the harshest environments. Assigned by a jeep equipped with state-of-the-art weapons, these four soldiers, including Colonel Decker, Lieutenant Bob, Sergeant Quint, and Corporal Gray are ready to take part in the journey to rescue their fellow companions his team.

title: Jackie Chan’s Action Kung Fu
description: Jackie Chan’s Action Kung Fu is an action game developed by Now Production and released by Nintendo in 1990. The game inspired by the real character is Jackie Chan – a famous martial arts actor in Hong Kong. With the mission of saving his sister, the player will control Jackie Chan fighting against many enemies and countless other dangers. The game includes five maps, and at the end of each map, players will have to clash with a boss. You have to defeat this boss if you want to go to the next map. In each map, there will be many levels with increasing difficulty.

title: Jurassic Park
description:
Jurassic Park is an action game developed by Ocean Software and released in 1993 for Nintendo. The game’s story is based on the film, and the novel has the same name with it. After some technical problems, the dinosaurs escaped from their captivity. Biologist Alan Grant and his colleagues are trapped on the island with large and ferocious creatures before the rescue team came, they would have to fight to protect their lives.
In the game, you will control biologist Alan Grant to fight the dinosaurs. At the beginning of the game, you will be equipped with no rather than a weak weapon. There will be five types of weapons, and the later will be stronger than the first equipment, including sedative guns, shotguns, grenade launchers, and rocket launchers. You can also upgrade your weapons by picking up items that drop out when killing the monsters. The character’s HP will be displayed in the left corner of the screen for the player can easy to see. When you let the dinosaurs or lava from the crater, you will lose the amount of hp you have. Animals will lose a life when the HP bar is depleted. When defeating monsters, they will drop items that restore lost HP, and sometimes it can give you an extra life.
There will be sensor devices throughout the game; it will give instructions for you to defeat the monsters more easily. If the player loses his life, then he will return to the position of the last sensor device you came into contact with. A character named DNA will provide information and types of dinosaurs when the player is inactive for a long time. Players will have to find the gates to reach the next level.
You will have to find and reactivate the computer for the sensors on the island to work again. These computers will be in different rooms, and players will have to collect ID cards to open these rooms. This ID card will be collected when you pass certain levels and are taken from the NPC standing at the top of a certain level. After activating the sensor, the player will detect nearby dinosaurs. You will have to stop the dinosaurs from getting on the ship to reach the mainland. Find the nests of these giants to destroy their eggs. To end the game, you will have to find a location to contact the outside world. They will bring a helicopter to rescue Alan Grant and his colleagues.

title: Kage
description: In the 21st century, the evil Emperor Garuda has taken over the city of New York, killing many of its inhabitants. You play as either Hayate or Kaede, two ninjas who are attempting to free the city from Garuda’s control.

title: Kirby's Adventure
description: Kirby's Adventure sur NES est un jeu de plates-formes dans lequel vous dirigez une petite boule de gomme rose qui a la faculté d'aspirer ses ennemis pour s'approprier leurs pouvoirs. Votre but est de rassembler les fragments du Bâton Etoile volé par le Roi Dadidou pour que les résidents du Pays des Rêves puissent de nouveau dormir sur leurs deux oreilles.

title: Kirby’s Adventure
description: Kirby’s Adventure is a platform game released by Nintendo in 1993. The game uses the same design as Kirby’s Dream Land, a part of the Kirby series. After waking up, Kirby goes to the Dream Land fountain to investigate. He discovers that King Dedede stole the Star Rod, the source of the power of the Fountain of Dreams, and broke it into seven pieces. King Dedede’s allies are Whispy Woods, Paint Roller, Mr. Shine – Mr. Bright, Kracko, Heavy Mole, and Meta Knight are tasked with storing 6 fragments. He will keep the last fragment. All residents of the Dream Land become restless and cannot enter the dream because the Star Rod is destroyed. Kirby decides to track down the pieces of the Star Rod from the enemy and take them back to the Fountain of Dreams to restore everyone’s dreams.
releaseDate:
JP: March 23, 1993
NA: May 1993
PAL: September 12, 1993

title: Kunio-kun no Nekketsu Soccer League
description: Hi, I am Misako of Nekketsu High. I am the manager of our local soccer team. Finally, we can prove that Nekketsu FC is the greatest team in the world. If we work hard and qualify, the Technos Japan Cup will determine who is the greatest in the world. After Nekketsu FC was formed, I was supposed to lead the team to victory, but I haven’t been able to keep my promise. But Kunio is here, and he will guide us to victory. I won’t meddle in, but I will offer my advice if you want it. Nekketsu FC, let’s go!

title: Kyatto Ninden Teyandee
description: Players take the role of the three main cats and otasuke (rescue team) members, who can be switched to at any time and have special abilities to progress through the game. The game features most of the characters in the series as well as an additional villain, a mysterious scientist named Dr. Purple (Dr. パープ). Based off a early 1990’s anime series.

title: Life Force
description: Life Force is part of the famous Gradius series released by Konami in 1986. The biggest difference of this game with games of the same genre is adding a two-player mode. A giant alien monster named Zelos is swallowing all the planets and even entire galaxies. Players will portray as one of two characters Vic Viper or Lord British (in one player mode) or can control both characters (with two-player mode) to penetrate inside the body of this monster and destroy it. During the journey, the player will control the character through six stages to complete the mission. At each stage, players will experience a terrain similar to the body parts of monsters. When moving to each position on its body, the player will meet different enemies. These enemies are easy to destroy. In the game, there are many weapons that they can choose to attack enemies such as shields, guns, missiles, and lasers. Each weapon will have a certain amount of ammo. Players need to attack correctly to ensure enough ammunition. Some items dropped when they destroyed enemies such as power boosts, bullets, movement speed items, and power drop items. Players will be in danger of accidentally collecting harmful items like items that reduce strength or speed. The amount of health and ammunition of the character will be displayed on the left of the screen. When a player’s health returns to zero, they lose. Players will be taken to the beginning of the stage to restart the game.

title: Little Nemo: The Dream Master
description: Based on the famous Tokyo Movie Shinsha movie and the series of the same name – Shinsha – Little Nemo: Adventures in Slumberland. Producer Capcom has released an exciting adventure game and it’s called Little Nemo: The Dream Master. The main character of the game is Nemo and it revolves around his journey to explore Slumberland. Each time he fell asleep, Nemo was taken to Slumberland. There, he is tasked with rescuing Morpheus – the king of Slumberland. Currently, the king is being held captive in the Nightmare lands. To complete the game, you need to defeat the Nightmare King and his evil army.
releaseDate:
NA: September 1990
JP: December 7, 1990
EU: December 12, 1990

title: Lizard
description:
Put on a lizard and go for an adventure!

Choose your lizard carefully. You can find six different ones scattered across the land, each with its own special ability.

You'll need these abilities as you make your difficult journey through many dangerous places. Carefully hop your way to the top of an active volcano. Surf down a surging river. Swim an underwater lake. Ascend a snowy mountaintop. What kind of strange creatures will you meet? Can you unravel the mysteries of Lizard?

title: Lode Runner
description: Lode Runner is a puzzle game; it was first published by Broderbund in 1983. One of the first features is a level option, allowing players to create their levels. In the game, the player must control their character to collect the amount of gold needed to pass the level. At the same time, you move flexibly so as not to be captured by enemies. After that, the player will be transferred to the next level. There are a total of 150 levels that players must pass. They challenge the player’s ability to solve problems and respond.

title: Mach Rider
description:
Mach Rider is an adventure action game developed and released by Nintendo in 1985. In the future, the Earth has been invaded by Cruel forces come from outside the universe. These forces control modern machines and weapons far beyond human comprehension. Everywhere they go, everything is destroyed, and killing happens everywhere. In the game, the player controls a character named Mach Rider. You will control the character from one area to another to destroy enemies and search for survivors in your car.
At the beginning of the game, the character will be equipped with a machine gun used to destroy enemies and obstacles along the way. After defeating enemies or obstacles, you will get some points. The number of points you receive depends on the type of enemy and the obstacles the player destroys. If the player kills an enemy by crashing into them, the score will be higher than destroying the enemy with a machine gun. However, if you crash into an obstacle, the speed of the vehicle will slow down, and the character will lose some HP. The points you earn will be used to buy more bullets for machine guns and buy more lives at the store after passing a level.
releaseDate:
JP: November 21, 1985
NA: August 1986
EU: March 15, 1987

title: Maniac Mansion
description: With a unique control system (point and click), Maniac Mansion will bring many intellectually attractive challenges for you to conquer. The content of the game revolves around the protagonist Dave Miller, he is trying to rescue his girlfriend from a mental scientist. This scientist is being controlled by an alien meteorite. He did many crazy experiments on Dave Miller’s girlfriend. To rescue his lover, he will have to break into the mansion of the mad scientist and overcome many dangerous traps.

title: Mappy-Land
description: Mappy-Land is a sequel to the Mappy series released by Namco in 1983. Different from the previous version, this version is available many playable levels with more challenges to overcome. You will have to control Mappy, through many different areas to get your girlfriend. This task becomes more difficult when the presence of Goro and members of the Meowkies gang. These characters will hinder you from performing your tasks, you need to escape their pursuit and collect the necessary items on the screen. In each level, the item you need to collect will be different according to its level theme. Additionally, each level is part of the Mappy story. In level 1, you will have to collect gifts to give to Mapico on her birthday. Level 2 refers to Mappy wants to marry Mapico, you will have to collect wedding rings. At level 3, you must collect Christmas trees to create a big party for Mapico. The last story is about Mappy Jr’s birthday, collect baseballs to give him.

title: Mega Man 2
description: Mega Man 2 is an action role-playing game that has the same gameplay as the previous version. Continuing Mega Man’s journey to defeat Dr Wily and Robot Master to bring peace to the world. The task of the player is to overcome 8 floors to destroy the robots blocking the road and obstacles before facing the final mission: fighting with Dr Wily’s fortress. Players will control Megaman to win battles with Master Robots that appear on each floor such as Metalman, Air Man, Bubbleman, Quick Man, Crash Man, Flashman, Heat Man and Woodman. The Robot Master does not possess any energy bars and can be destroyed by sixteen normal attacks or three attacks on their weaknesses. When defeating each Robotmaster, the player will receive the unique weapon of Robot Master. Using weapons collected on the previous floor will make it easier to play against Robot Master on the next floors. After passing certain levels, Megaman will receive a special item. This item will help Mega Man move into special areas to complete the task easily.

title: Mega Man 3
description: In 1990, Mega Man 3 was released. In this version, players will be involved in fighting with more challenge. Eight bosses with different offensive and defensive skills have been prepared for you to defeat. Besides being fought with many bosses, this version is designed with a new feature. It allows Mega Man to slide along the way to evade attack skills from enemies or overcome lowly arranged barriers.

title: Mega Man 4
description:
Mega Man 4 was developed with a new series of events and continues the story of Mega Man 3. One year after the end of Mega Man 3, a new villain appeared and he was named Dr. Cossack. The new villain has built an army of his own and invaded eight different cities with the aim of dominating the world like Dr. Willy. Each city is controlled by a different Robot Master. Similar to the previous 3 versions, each Robot Master will have a unique system of weapons and combat skills. Therefore, you need to calm and overcome many different attacks of the enemy.
In Mega Man 4, players continue to choose 1 of 8 Robot Master to fight without exploring in a fixed sequence. Besides, defeating Robot Master helps Mega Man collect their special weapons which unique for each boss to help you use many different attack skills. From there, you can defeat enemies quickly with many new fighting styles. After defeating 8 bosses in 8 cities, there will be 2 new side quests open for you to end the game.
releaseDate:
JP: December 6, 1991
NA: January 1992
EU: January 21, 1993

title: Mega Man 5
description: After Dr. Willy’s evil plot was stopped at Mega Man 4. Coming to Mega Man 5, he continues his plan to invade and rule the world with an army of mighty robots. However, this time Dr. Willy also received the help of Proto Man – Mega Man’s brother and was also designed by Dr. Light. In a plan to invade the world, Proton Man kidnapped Dr. Light to threaten Mega Man. To save the world and its creator, Megan Man must fight many bosses and overcome dangerous traps.

title: Mega Man 6
description: After 5 times defeating and stopping the evil plans of Dr. Willy, everyone decided to form the Global Robot Alliance. Once established, the Alliance organized a fascinating contest to find the strongest robot and gave that person the task of protecting the world. This event is called the annual Robot Tournament. In addition, this tournament is financially supported by Mr.X – a mysterious man and owner of Fund X. In search of the strongest warrior, this tournament has the participation of many strong and famous robots around the world.

title: Metal Gear
description: In Metal Gear, the player controls an army officer codenamed Solid Snake, then invades the enemy’s base. To keep him safe, Solid Snake needs to move carefully to avoid the attention of the guards. If an intruder is detected, the alert system in the base of the enemy is activated. Players need to quickly escape the sight of enemies and continue to perform the mission. He will escape the attention of the enemy depends on each case. If he sees a single exclamation mark appearing on an enemy’s head, he can escape by moving to the next area to limit their view. However, if two exclamation points appear on the head of the enemy or a loud sound is emitted on the infrared sensor, Snake can only escape by destroying all enemies approaching and going out or into the elevator.

title: Metroid
description: On planet SR388, Space pirates attacked a Galaxy Federation research vessel and captured the Metroid creature. Metroid is a dangerous creature for all other species on this planet, it can parasitize any individual and destroy the subject by sucking up their energy. Intending to use them as biological weapons to destroy all creatures, this group of space pirates planned to create Metroid by exposing them to beta rays to stimulate their fertility. Facing that threat, the Galactic Federation sent Samus Aran – a bounty hunter – to infiltrate the pirate group’s base and destroy biological weapons.

title: Mighty Final Fight
releaseDate:
JP: June 11, 1993
NA: July 1993
PAL: August 1993

title: Mike Tyson’s Punch-Out!!
description: It’s a right jab, a left hook, an uppercut – it’s Mike Tyson’s Punch-Out!! where you’ll get the chance to compete against boxers from around the globe. Punch your way through 13 bouts in the minor, major and world circuits against tough contestants like Piston Honda, Glass Joe, Super Macho Man and many, many more! Defeat all your opponents and meet the ultimate challenge against the World Heavyweight Champion Mike Tyson in the greatest fight of all – The Dream Bout! Knockout Tyson and you can become WVBA (World Video Boxing Association) Champ!

title: Mitsume Ga Tooru
description: Mitsume ga Tooru (三つ目がとおる Mitsume ga tōru?, “The Three-eyed One”) is a video game for the Family Computer that was developed by Natsume and published by Tomy. It is based on the manga and anime called The Three-Eyed One. The main character is Hosuke Sharaku. There is also a Mitsume ga Tooru game for the original MSX called Mitsume ga Tooru: The Three-Eyed One Comes Here, which was released by Natsume two years before this one.

title: Monster In My Pocket
description: Monster in My Pocket is an adventure action game that was released for Nintendo in 1992 by Konami. Warlock is an evil sorcerer, he wants the power of all the monsters and makes them listen to his deviation. Warlock created a miniature spell to use as punishment for anyone, any monster against him. All monsters were afraid of his spell, but the monsters didn’t know that it was a lie. As time went by, all monsters chose to be Warlock’s henchmen. However, there are Vampires and The Monsters who are the two monsters who are determined not to be Warlock’s minions. This angered him, and Warlock sent his minions to the monsters’ whereabouts to arrest them. The Warlock army is led by Kraken, Bigfoot, Gremlin, Medusa and Spring-Heeled Jack. While Vampire and The Monster were watching TV at Miles’ home, Warlock’s henchmen attacked their whereabouts. To rescue the other monsters, Vampire and The Monster will have to fight the Warlock’s henchmen. In the end, they will have to defeat the evil sorcerer Warlock.

title: Nekketsu Kakutou Densetsu
description: One day at school, Kunio was minding his own business when suddenly, he found a note on his locker. The note says their is a fighting tournament hosted by the “Double Tiger” twins. Seeing it as a challenge he could not refuse, Kunio runs off to participate. When Riki sees Kunio running and read his note, he decides to enter as well. Many other fighters will join in to see who is the strongest.

title: Ninja Gaiden
description: Developed with a third perspective, Ninja Gaiden will bring fierce battles and the journey of revenge for the family of a strong will warrior. The game will require you to control Ryu – a ninja with much combat experience. And you have the task to help Ryu overcome many different challenges to find the man who murdered his family.

description:
Prince of Persia is an action-adventure game released in 1989 by Nintendo. The game is set in ancient Persia. While General Sultan is fighting on the battlefield, the cruel prime minister Jaffar has killed the monarchy and seized power. He captured the princess and locked her in a tower. If she did not agree to be his wife, she would die in two days. Receiving information about his lover, the Sultan returned and was locked in a dungeon. To free her, he must escape from the dungeon to go to her custody and defeat Jaffar before time runs out. He will face many pitfalls on his way out of prison. In addition, the Sultan will have to fight his copy created from the magic mirror before meeting Jaffar.
The game consists of 12 levels. You will control the Sultan to escape from the dungeon and reach the tower before time runs out. During the mission, players will have to face many pitfalls and fight with many enemies. You will be provided with the amount of hp shown at the bottom of the screen. This HP will be lost when you hit the enemy hit, stick traps falling from a position higher than where you are standing. After defeating the enemy, they will drop items with different colors and sizes. The red potion will restore you some HP. If you pick up the blue potion, your HP will be slightly depleted. In addition, you can fly to avoid hitting traps and attacking enemies from above when picking up green items. After defeating an enemy, you will receive bonus points depending on the difficulty of the enemy you have defeated. Using bonus points, you will buy weapons with greater power and items needed to complete the task as quickly as possible. If your HP runs out, your character will die. You will return to the stage where the character dies but the timer will not stop.

If the player is at the bottom of the standings after around, they can restart the previous race. However, their accumulated points will be lost and only has 2 restarts of the race. title: Tetris
description: Tetris is a logical thinking game designed by a Soviet software engineer named Alexey Pajitnov in June 1984. As a mathematician and is working at Dorodnitsyn Computer Center of the Soviet Academy of Sciences. He loves geometry and the puzzles are made of them. Therefore, Alexey Pajitnov developed a game to satisfy his passion for geometry. The name Tetris was coined by Alexey Pajitnov based on a combination of the Greek prefix tetra and tennis as his favorite sport. At that time, this was the first game that the United States imported from the Soviet Union. Because of its versatility, the game is compatible with nearly every gaming device and computer operating system, as well as on devices such as computers and mobile phones. In January 2010, it was announced that this was one of the most successful commercialized games and had sold more than a total of over 170 million copies. About 70 million copies are sales with CDs and 100 million copies are downloaded on mobile phones. This has turned it into the second best-selling paid download game of all time after Minecraft.

title: Yoshi
description: Yoshi is a puzzle game released by Nintendo in 1991. The game is divided into several different levels. At each level, there will be a large number of monsters falling from the ceiling. The task of the player is to destroy all monsters by placing two identical monsters in a column.

title: Zelda II: The Adventure of Link
description: Based on the plot of The Legend of Zelda, the second version of this game was released as Zelda II: The Adventure of Link. In this next version, you will be on a new adventure with Link. In addition, the battle system and character upgrades have been changed to bring exciting experiences for players.

title: Zelda: The Legend of Link
description: Various ancient legends have been recorded of a young boy clothed in green, wielding the mythical master sword, sealing away all evil throughout the land. His ventures, passed down through generations have become legend. The hero of legend, had many different forms. He saved many kingdoms, restoring peace in all the lands. This is but one of the legends, of which the people speak…
